ing: 1 small yellow mango - peeled, pitted, and roughly chopped
des: "Delicious, quick and fresh kale smoothie! Tastes great and has a yummy pineapple kick to it."
ins: Place kale and spinach in a blender; blend until leaves become finely chopped. Add pineapple juice and orange juice; blend until smooth. Add pineapple and mango; blend until smooth.
